div.p: THAT THE SIGHT OF A MEDEUSAN
TO ANY HUMAN WHO SEES ONE.
IF YOU'LL GO WITH MR. SCOTT,
I'M SURE THE TWO OF YOU
I'M SURE YOU WILL FIND IT
AND TALK YOU OUT OF IT?
I WOULD SAY THAT DR. JONES
Kirk: YES, I THINK MOST OF
FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFE?
WHY DID I EVER MEET YOU?
THE WAY YOU WANT ME TO.
TO KILL, LARRY? IS IT ME?
BE ON THE WATCH FOR HIM.
AS A RESULT OF LARRY MARVICK'S
WE HAVE NO WAY TO DETERMINE
UP TO THE POINT AT WHICH
AND WE SHALL DO SO AGAIN
A MADMAN CAN GET US OUT.
IN SOME WAYS, SHE IS STILL
IF IT IS AT ALL POSSIBLE,
HER MIND MUST BE SO ENGAGED
IT IS NOT POSSIBLE FOR YOU
PITY IS THE WORST OF ALL.
YOU'LL HAVE TO TAKE THIS UP
IT SEEMS I HAVE NO CHOICE
TO RETURN TO OUR OWN GALAXY
IS KNOWN TO YOU AS KOLLOS.
I SPEAK FOR ALL OF US
I AM SORRY FOR THE TROUBLE
WE DON'T HOLD YOU TO BLAME
BUT IS ANY ONE OF YOU
NO DOUBT YOU THINK I CAN
AND FOR THAT HE MUST DIE.
BUT YOU CAN'T LIE TO KOLLOS.
